topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538b6ff9636872574ec20200#post_538b6ff9636872574ec20200
Probably a founding father for "conjoiners".

(If you don't get that reference it's a scifi reference to a book in which the human race has been wiped out by aliens and the only humans that survive are ones that are cyborgs that share processing power thus adapt technology faster than the aliens can wipe them out thus saving the last of humanity.  Basically the book is the majority of humans reject cybernetics thus get wiped out by aliens, but the people that embrace it assimilate the alien technology and thus survive.  Not borg, rather they're all super geniuses cause they share mental processing power)
